title: Oceanic LOL Cup - $500 RP First Prize (Registration Open Now)
body:
Hey guys and girls!

Why not grab you  and 4 mates and enter the Oceanic LOL Cup!
Entry is the $25 per team and you could win $500 RP!
Here's what you need to know :D.
______

**Details**
- The Oceanic LoL Cup is a competition being hosted by Oceanic LoL on Facebook. 
- The competition will span over 4 weeks.
- The competition will begin with the Group Stages. 
- Teams will be split into 4 groups (0f 6) and compete in a ** round robin style competition. **
- These games will be played on the weekends between Saturday 10am AEST and Sunday 4pm AEST. The group stages will conclude after 3 weeks. 
- Out of a maximum of (24) teams, only (8) will advance.
- The Playoffs will take place on the 4th week, with a Double-Elimination format being played over the weekend and a best-of-3 Final to be played on Sunday night at 6pm AEST. 
- The Playoffs will be broadcasted live and shoutcasted on the Oceanic LoL twitch channel. www.twitch.tv/OceanicLoL
______

**Dates**
**Competition Dates: Games played on Saturday and/or Sunday**
ROUND 1 - 2nd & 3rd of May, 2015
ROUND 2 - 9th of May 2015
ROUND 3 - 10th of May 2015
ROUND 4 - 16th of May 2015
ROUND 5 - 17th of May 2015

**TOP 8 DOUBLE ELIMINATION: Broadcasted Live on twitch.tv/OceanicLol**
Saturday 23rd of May 2015
Sunday 24th of May 2015
_____

**Prize Pool**
1st place team - $500 of RP
2nd place team - $250 of RP
3rd place team - $125 of RP
4th place team - $50 of RP

PLUS! Heaps of RP and PC Accessories to be given away to competitors and viewers of the stream!
_____

**Entry Requirements **
 You must be level 30
• You must have a League of Legends account on the Oceania Region
• $25 Team Entry – This is to prevent time-wasters
• A maximum of 7 players can be registered to a team – Any changes to the roster must be approved by an Oceanic LoL Cup admin.
• Players must have a Facebook account and be a member of the Oceanic LoL Facebook group
www.facebook.com/groups/OceanicLoL
To register your team send the following information to OceanicLoLCup@gmail.com
• Team Name (3 to 24 characters)
• Player IGN’s (min 5 max 7) *Note: Changes to your roster after registration must be approved by an Oceanic LoL Cup admin.*
• Player Facebook Profiles – To check if players are members of Oceanic LoL
• Team Captain
• Team Captain Email

_______
**To Enter**
Sent details to: Oceaniclolcup@gmail.com
Registration Closes: 30th April, 2015.

Any inquires you can ask me here, on the OCE Facebook Page or to the email

GL HF
Skyprus

replies.body: I've heard one of their shoutcaster's is extremely handsome and good at what he does.

You're right! His name is Bishopped and he shoutcasted the last tournament they held. This year he'll be captaining his own team to victory though, so they'll have to bring in some second-string shoutcasters.{{item:3070}}
Oh I cant wait to watch!
Just a question about the entry requirements, why are the players IGN's limited to 7 characters? Seems inconvenient to the players.

That restriction is to the number if players per team not IGN's :D.

So you can have up to two subs/7players registered for your team.
